package.name: gmp
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-6.1.2 case `uname -m` in i?86) CFLAGS='-mtune=generic -march=i686' CXXFLAGS='-mtune=generic -march=i686' ABI=32 ./configure --prefix=/usr --enable-cxx && make -j 4 ;; armv6l) ./configure --prefix=/usr --enable-cxx && make -j 2 ;; *) CFLAGS='-mtune=generic' CXXFLAGS='-mtune=generic' ./configure --prefix=/usr --enable-cxx && make -j 4 ;; esac
package.test: cd ${PKGNAME}-6.1.2 make check 2>&1 | tee gmp-check-log awk '/tests passed/{total+=$2} ; END{print total}' gmp-check-log
